[++QR Scan Simulation Codes++]

[Simulate Gohanks event QR]
D3000000 3075669C
A0000000 FFFB0004
DB000000 00000000
D4000000 00000004
D8000000 00000000
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
D2000000 00000000
{Activates the Gohanks event in Baba's Pallace}
